column2: [[1969]]) is a Junior Assistant Professor at the Institute of English and American Studies at the [[wikipedia:University of Szeged|University of Szeged]]. He has taught courses on Tolkien and Plato (and the connections between the two)
column3: and is also a founding member and the academic vice president of the [[Hungarian Tolkien Society]].
